resources.string: If you are, this\'ll be easy. Press the button below to confirm root access.
The setup will guide you through the steps needed to get up and running.
This app will allow you to change you phone\'s DPI, whether or not you have root.
Run the following commands using ADB:
It seems the permissions setup didn\'t work. Are you sure you set everything up?
Great! You\'re done! Go change that DPI.
Just make sure you have the necessary permissions by pressing the TEST button.
Since you aren\'t rooted, that unfortunately means you\'ll also need to reboot after applying.
